name: Workshop: All we must know about Android
description:
Nowadays, who doesn’t know what is Android OS? Do you know how to develop an Android application? Do you know where to start? You don’t have deep programming skills, but you still want to? Are you an expert and you would love also to learn, improve or even share some skills?

In this tech talk, you will learn the basics of Android programming with Tiago Ornelas. Because he has a vast experience in developing Android applications, he will help you to overcome your first difficulties, so you can conquer anything with your future application(s)!

The price of the workshop has a symbolic price of € 5.00, which includes a coffee break and a certificate - go to https://gdgmadeira.xyz for more payment details. Just bring a computer and we will take care of the rest for you ðŸ‘Œ!

Places are limited, book your ticket now!
how_to_find_us: We will be present at the Jesuits' College of Funchal starting at 9:30 am, to begin the process of accreditation.
